function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of misinformation and conspiracy theories about the new virus","Impact":"Increased public fear, distrust in public health measures, and potential non-compliance with prevention strategies","Mitigation":"Public health education, fact-checking, and promoting trusted sources of information","Technologies":"Digital platforms for spreading accurate information, data analysis for fact-checking","People":"General public, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Public health authorities, media, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Exaggerated estimates of infection rates and case fatality rate","Impact":"Misallocation of resources, unnecessary public fear, and erosion of public trust in health organizations","Mitigation":"Continued surveillance and data analysis, improved testing and reporting methods","Technologies":"Data analytics, improved testing technologies","People":"Public health agencies, researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Panic shopping and excess hospital admissions leading to strain on health systems","Impact":"Shortages of essential medical supplies, increased risk of nosocomial infection, and reduced access to care for non-COVID patients","Mitigation":"Regulated procurement of medical supplies, public education on appropriate use of protective gear, and hospital capacity planning","Technologies":"Inventory management systems, telehealth platforms, public health messaging","People":"Healthcare workers, hospital administrators, general public","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, regulatory bodies, government"}]}
